name: Super Jump Girl Plus
description:
*Super Jump Girl*

Help an tiny girl to get her little cat back in this retro like platformer. Collect coins and pickups to beat all tricky levels and reach your goal. Classic difficulty with limited number of lives.

8Bit jump and run with classic gameplay!
Retro graphics and sounds with nostalgic chiptune tracks!
Handcrafted levels!
No IAP just pixel!
Without Ads!

app-apes.com - 6.5/10
Engaging Gameplay
